comment.body: This looks like a site suited for ZN.
But... Discord is a service run by people that glow in the dark.

Same. I'm currently looking at Jami p2p messenger, but I have the same problem... People already have a messenging app - damned if it's Facebook Messenger or whatever.
@mxh69420: Matrix seems decent but there's an issue with the concept, as is with every federated system - It's centralized in the way that a lot of users connects to a single server, even if that server federates. That's a single server that needs to be taken down or DDOSed or whatever.

@ulrichard: Haha, exactly the same experience as me. I did enjoy hacking it and installing Doom on my 1. gen. Ipod Nano and swapping out the OS to RockBox... But having that fight with equipment I use daily and rely on? No thanks.
@ulrichard: Toilet poetry used to be a life saver, what else was there to do but read? Thankfully we live in the age of smartphones.

This should be archived, did this work? http://127.0.0.1:43110/19X7J2VbS66WDFpT7zRY66kobPgG7S8yHx/data/users/1BGbPKebmViMTLZCXFyTW39G11yx6Qz3Ej/https__twitter.com_WolfieChristl_status_1331221942850949121.html
